Welcome to cfDNA’s documentation!#

cfdna – Library for analysis of cell-free DNA fragments#

The Python-based implementation efficiently deals with many fragments.

cfDNA provides a scalable way to store and search overlapping intervals

See the code and discuss development on GitHub.

Release Notes#

Version 2.1.2#

General updates for pip installation

  • See installation

Version 2.1.1#

Function simplifications

Version 2.1.0#

Commandline interface created

  • See tutorials

Version 2.0.0#

cfDNA class overhaul

  • Now a subclass of the ProjectFrame object

Documentation overhaul

  • Creation of documentation for cfDNA
